title: Unhandled error while processing request /eth2/beacon_chain/req/status/1/ssz_snappy
body:
Seen a couple of these today:

```
2020-06-01 08:54:25.309+00:00 | LibP2PNetwork-667 | ERROR | Eth2IncomingRequestHandler | Unhandled error while processing request /eth2/beacon_chain/req/status/1/ssz_snappy
tech.pegasys.teku.networking.p2p.rpc.RpcStream$StreamClosedException: null
        at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.p2p.libp2p.rpc.LibP2PRpcStream.writeBytes(LibP2PRpcStream.java:44) ~[teku-networking-p2p-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-c7e4825a]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.eth2.rpc.core.RpcResponseCallback.respond(RpcResponseCallback.java:34) ~[teku-networking-eth2-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-c7e4825a]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.eth2.rpc.beaconchain.methods.StatusMessageHandler.onIncomingMessage(StatusMessageHandler.java:51) ~[teku-networking-eth2-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-c7e4825a]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.eth2.rpc.beaconchain.methods.StatusMessageHandler.onIncomingMessage(StatusMessageHandler.java:27) ~[teku-networking-eth2-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-c7e4825a]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.eth2.rpc.core.PeerRequiredLocalMessageHandler.lambda$onIncomingMessage$0(PeerRequiredLocalMessageHandler.java:29) ~[teku-networking-eth2-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-c7e4825a]
        at java.util.Optional.ifPresentOrElse(Optional.java:194) ~[?:?]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.eth2.rpc.core.PeerRequiredLocalMessageHandler.onIncomingMessage(PeerRequiredLocalMessageHandler.java:28) ~[teku-networking-eth2-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-c7e4825a]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.eth2.rpc.core.Eth2IncomingRequestHandler.handleRequest(Eth2IncomingRequestHandler.java:81) ~[teku-networking-eth2-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-c7e4825a]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.eth2.rpc.core.Eth2IncomingRequestHandler.processInput(Eth2IncomingRequestHandler.java:70) ~[teku-networking-eth2-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-c7e4825a]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.p2p.libp2p.rpc.RpcHandler$Controller.lambda$setRequestHandler$0(RpcHandler.java:209) ~[teku-networking-p2p-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-c7e4825a]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.util.async.SafeFuture.fromRunnable(SafeFuture.java:104) ~[teku-util-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-c7e4825a]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.util.async.AsyncRunner.lambda$runAsync$0(AsyncRunner.java:24) ~[teku-util-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-c7e4825a]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.util.async.DelayedExecutorAsyncRunner.lambda$runAsync$1(DelayedExecutorAsyncRunner.java:57) ~[teku-util-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-c7e4825a]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1128) [?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:628) [?:?]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:830) [?:?]
```
